workflowBoard.title: Workflow Board

workflowBoard.howToUseTitle: How to use the Kanban Board
workflowBoard.howToUseDescription: Drag and drop candidate cards between columns and rows to move them through your workflow stages. Click on a candidate card or name to view their full details. Row stages show only candidate names for quick reference.
workflowBoard.selectPhase: Please select a phase to view the workflow board.

companyProfile.title: Company Profile

addRole.title: Add Company Role
addRole.description: Define a new role for your team

initializePhases.title: Initialize Default Phases
initializePhases.description: Initialize your company's phase configuration with the default setup. This will create 4 standard phases (Sourcing, Evaluation, Offer & Pre-Onboarding, and Talent Pool) with their default workflows. Only works if you don't have existing phases.

modal.title: Initialize Default Phases?
modal.description: This action will initialize 4 default phases with their workflows:
modal.note: Note: This will only work if you don't have existing phases. If phases already exist, you'll need to delete them first from the Phase Management page.

workflows.title: Workflow Settings
workflows.subtitle: Manage your recruitment workflows and stages

workflows.createFirstWorkflow: Create your first workflow to organize your recruitment process
workflows.advancedConfigSaveSuccess: All changes have been saved successfully
workflows.advancedConfigWorkflowNotFoundDescriptio: The requested workflow could not be found.
workflows.advancedConfigNoCustomFieldsDescription: Add custom fields to your workflow to configure their visibility and validation rules.
workflows.aboutDescription: Workflows help you organize your recruitment process into stages. Each workflow can have multiple stages, and you can assign candidates to workflows to track their progress through your hiring pipeline. Set one workflow as default to automatically assign new candidates to it.
workflows.customFieldsLinkText: You can configure custom fields for each stage

form.noTemplates: No templates available for this type

hero.title: Recruit Exceptional Talent with
hero.subtitle: Save up to 70% on costs and time in your selection process. Our AI platform is 100% customizable, with automated workflows, intelligent candidate nurturing to build lasting relationships, and predictive assistance that finds perfect matches. Turn candidates into loyal employees and brand ambassadors!

benefits.title: Why choose us?
benefits.subtitle: Everything you need to transform your selection process

reduceCosts.title: Reduce Costs and Time
reduceCosts.description: Automate repetitive processes and significantly reduce hiring time and costs.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Adapt the platform to your company's specific needs with customizable workflows and configurations.

completeFlow.title: Complete Flow
completeFlow.description: Manage the entire recruitment process from sourcing to hiring in a single platform.

workflowSelection.title: Select Workflows

workflowSelection.hiringPipelineDescription: Defines the stages candidates will go through during recruitment
workflowSelection.cannotChangeAfterCreation: These workflows cannot be changed after the position is created.
workflowSelection.missingWorkflowsDescription: You need to configure workflows before creating a job position:
